id: sample01: How to Make Parallel Books

title.target: パラレルブックの作り方

paragraph.source: Parallel corpora are powerful tools to learn languages.
paragraph.target: 平行コーパスは言語を学ぶための強力なツールです。

paragraph.source: With them, you can learn foreign languages easily by reading your favorite stories.
paragraph.target: それらを使えば、お気に入りの物語を読むことで外国語を簡単に学ぶことができます。

paragraph.source: Each sentence in the original corpus is associated with its translation in your mother tongue.
paragraph.target: 元のコーパスの各文は、母国語への翻訳と関連付けられています。

paragraph.source: This project provides scripts to make parallel books from arbitrary contents.  All you have to do is to prepare the original corpus and run some commands to make parallel books in various formats.  Translation is done by AI platforms like ChatGPT and Gemini.
